text: Pedro Alfredo Pinto Rubianes (31 January 1931 â€“ 18 April 2022) was an Ecuadorian politician. He was Vice President of Ecuador from 27 January 2000 to 15 January 2003, during the presidency of Gustavo Noboa. He was a member of the National Congress from 1998 until 2000. Pinto Rubianes was Minister of Finance in the government of Osvaldo Hurtado from 1982 to 1984. He was born in Quito, Ecuador. Pinto Rubianes died on 18 April 2022 at his home in Quito, aged 91. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Vice presidents of Ecuador
